name: KILLSTORM (Canceled)
blurb: Take the pilot seat of a lethally-armed attack helicopter in this reimagining of a retro classic.

rewards.reward: Nice Touch Salute You!\r\n==============================\r\nThanks for supporting this project! You\u2019ll get a KILLSTORM salute should we ever meet in person.

Push the Throttle!
==============================
With this pledge receive a digital download of the game; this pledge price is below the eventual release price!
This tier includes an HD digital download Kickstarter-exclusive, backer-only wallpaper pack and a special place on the KILLSTORM website credits for all to see.
Don’t worry; you’ll still get that KILLSTORM salute should we ever meet in person.

Do You Copy?!
==============================
This level includes an access code for an exclusive backer-only Kickstarter helicopter skin so you can boost your prowess on the battlefield.
The rank of Airman will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

Early bird catches the Hellfire!
==============================
Receive early access to the online beta of the game where you will be able to post feedback and blast your way through enemies before others get the chance.
The rank of Airman First Class will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.
This special tier price is limited so get it while the missiles are flying!

Have your say!
==============================
Receive early access to the online beta of the game where you will be able to post feedback and blast your way through enemies before others get the chance.
The rank of Airman First Class will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

Can you keep a secret?
==============================
Ride the storm with the access code to an exclusive, backer-only Kickstarter bonus mission!
Includes a digital map of the game and all its hidden secrets!
The rank of Sergeant will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

Tag you're it!
==============================
Engage the fear factor in your enemy with an exclusive access code for the Red Devil helicopter skin in the game.
The rank of Staff Sergeant will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

Looking sharp!
==============================
Speed is of the essence with an exclusive access code for Blue Lightning helicopter skin in the game.
The rank of Master Sergeant will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

Bling for the win!
==============================
Camouflage?! … pfff who needs camouflage when you have an exclusive access code for the special Gold Maverick helicopter skin in the game.
We will also throw in the access code for the special rock hard bonus mission so you can show how hard you really are!
The rank of Senior Master Sergeant will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

I fly a soap box!
==============================
You get an exclusive invitation to come chat with us in online chat room sessions where you can discuss ideas about the game and your thoughts! If you pitch a good game idea that we use in the game you will receive a credit in the game for all to see!
The rank of Lieutenant will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

Slip Me Some Skin!
==============================
Receive a limited edition of the game with a Nice Touch Games helicopter skin in your digital download.
This tier also includes a bonus Nice Touch Games level, only available in your download!
The rank of Captain will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

It’s personal!
==============================
In your edition of the digital download your name will appear on the helicopter and text. This custom version of the game is just for you!
You will also receive an HD bonus signed digital picture of your helicopter which also will be viewable on our website as a sign of your dedication to the cause!
The rank of Major will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

You're Special to Us!
==============================
Within the game several special agents will help our pilots achieve success and their goals. We will name one of these agents after you for all to see!
The rank of Special Agent will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

(Keep it clean; we can only allow names we deem appropriate and not obscene.)

Picasso flies helicopters!
==============================
Fancy being creative? Design your own helicopter skin which you can use in your unique digital download of the game!
Your skin will also be displayed on our website as a sign of your dedication to the cause.
The rank of Colonel will be added to your name on our KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.

New best friend!
==============================
Name the co-pilot in the game for all to see! You will be the one referred to in all co-pilot text within the game.
 
The rank of General will be added to your name on the top of the KILLSTORM website credits.
Includes all previous rewards.
 
(Keep it clean; we can only allow names we deem appropriate and not obscene.)
